dimensions: Warp: 99 cm (39 in.). Weft: 93.5 cm (36 3/4 in.). Both edges cut. Pattern: height of repeat: 91.5 cm (36 in.). Width of plate: 91.5 cm (36 in.). Designed for lengths to be sewn together as a straight repeat.
title: Textile
medium: Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
description: Design illustrating a boat hunt with two scenes alternate with scenes of mounted riders (one blowing a horn) and a groom holding the reins of a woman on horseback and a standing man holding a gun, both drinking a stirrup cup. In red on white.
name: Textile
